result.title: Final report on Warsaw demonstration execution
result.description: These report aim to present the timeline of preparation and execution of the demonstration meetings workshops installations monitoring feedback collection etc They will contain information on the technical and business barriers to the demonstration information about access to services and APIs the collaboration and data sharing agreements information on legacy systems and other information that COHESIVE will require for a successful demonstration so they will provide inputs to the evaluation task T62 By writing the first draft of each of these reports in M20 the milestone M51 will be also reached In cooperation with COHESIVE and other IP4 projects involved in relevant demonstrations the results and conclusions of the demonstration execution will be elaborated in T51 and included in D51 too
